title: Take that, France!
body: Natalie Portman is America's answer to the 10,000 Gigawatt cuteness of Audrey Tautou. Presidents don't stop wars, Natalie Portmans do. Remember that on November 3rd... 2ND... I meant 2nd.
author: Dan

comments.author: whittler
comments.body: Two bootilicious women. Amelie and the Spanish Apartment are two of my favourite films!

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body:
Whittler: how right you are.

Nicki: you're my Amelie!

comments.author: John
comments.body: I'll remember it today if that's okay with you.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Absolutely! Remember it whenever and where-ever you like.

comments.author: nicholas
comments.body: when i was production manager of the tribeca film festival nat's mom lost her reading glasses. i spent about an hour tracking them down and when i returned them she gave me a big hug--this coincided with nat coming off the red carpet. at the time i had a really big bushy beard and shoulder length hair (a very gruff, scary look). she was really confused to see her mom hugging me. the next day, i dropped my girlfriend off at the airport and when i was waving goodbye, the person in front of her looked at me with an aura of fright i have never before seen. it was natalie portman. swear to god, she now thinks i'm stalking her.
